According to CYIM 20-008, "This well-known scam addresses the targeted person by name and references one of their passwords, often in the subject line, to catch their  attention. The email then claims to have hacked their computer and filmed them watching pornography.  The malicious actor threatens to send the videos to all of the victimâ€™s contacts unless they pay a bitcoin ransom.
